main.shortDescription: I'm a Romania / Drăgășani based Front End Software Developer
main.name: Alin Sofianu
main.description: Aimed to offer user-friendly experiences with a Web Environment found in a rapid change. The Web can be tricky to understand, so I want my colleagues and customers to benefit from it's full potential
main.bio: I am a tinkerer at heart, with an entrepreneurial spirit, a knack for healthy living, and a passion for coding. Self-motivated as being shown by the fact that I work in Software Development after attending a Marketing - Economic Studies college. Continuous Education, I enjoy training/learning new things, considering that the more you know the more value what your already know gets. I am an even tempered person, never engaging in negative thinking.
main.contactmessage: Have a project for me? Think I'd be a good fit for your team? I'd love to hear from you, so you can give me a phone call, a shout by email or by using the form below if you'd like to get in contact with me.

resume.skillmessage: Development knowledge, including HTML5/CSS3, Javascript(ES6), ReactJS, Redux, Material-UI, GatsbyJS, Contentful CMS, GraphQL, Netlify, Heroku, Git, GitHub, GitLab.

education.description: After the admission exam I recived a performance scholarship. During my time in college, I studied economics and marketing, while running a small business in farming and selling pet fishes and aquariums. Also, I wrote english articles on various topics for www.afladespre.ro.

education.school: High School - National College Gib Mihaescu
education.description: I obtained a Certificate on Computer Software, after an examination held in Creating Computer Software, Systems Databases Management and Operating Systems. Finished high-school with a 9,78/10 score at the Baccalaureate exam.

work.title: Front-end developer
work.description: After I learnt enough ReactJS in order to start applying my knowledge to a real project I started working as a front-end developer on ferzy.com (a SEO tool used for analyzing keyword difficulty). While working on this project I've become accustomed with a lot more tools and technologies used in a modern web application like: npm, Babel, Webpack, Redux, redux-saga, as well as the Google Material Design guidelines.

work.title: Study/Personal projects
work.description: At this point I have decided to take some time off to focus on studying pure JavaScript in depth in order to become a full time front-end engineer. After getting the hang of JavaScript I decided on ReactJS as my framework of choice, and started building small projects on my own, with ReactJS and other Front End/React ecosystem technologies.

work.title: Junior Developer/Bug fixer
work.description: The company's activity revolves around iGaming industry, offering various services on sporting bets, online casinos and payments management. These services include building and maintaining websites, sporting odds with bet settlement and implementing new features for the online casino customers. During my time with EveryMatrix, I have attended and graduated the EM Front - End Academy, with courses on HTML5/CSS3, Photoshop and basic JavaScript. As a junior developer and as a level 3 Customer support I was working very closely with both departments, identifying and fixing bugs on our websites.

projects.title: Auto Club Reviews
projects.category: Blog like app with a cloud CMS.

testimonials.text: The boss everybody desires and every boss wants to be!
The boss I have always dreamed of!
Now that Alin Sofianu is my boss, I have never felt happier!
